After having your first out of body experience
you will know it's possible,
and this first hand knowledge will make you easier to induce or repeat performance. 
In fact, every out of body voyage will make you more familiar with the process
of shifting your awareness into the non physical realms. 
It will soon become a natural ability, 
skill that will allow you to experience anything that your heart desires.
 As long as you believe that you can do it, 
and as long as you have the desire and the discipline, 
you will definitely have 
out of body experience, 
it's only a matter of time.
What I'm Feeling

The pause of the morning, it gave me a chill
And I knew I’d soon have to decide
Tired of living, just to pay off my bills
So I packed up without a goodbye
